name: The Burglar on the Roof
description: There is a burglar on the rooftop of a Manhattan office building&comma and he is trying to break in. Two women spot him&comma and one of them begins beating him with a broom as they wait for help to arrive. Soon others do appear on the scene to help&comma but by now the burglar has decided that he is going to put up a fight in an attempt to escape.

name: The Cavalier's Dream
description: He sits asleep at a bare table; old witch enters&comma raps three times&comma then disappears; cavalier sees table spread for a sumptuous repast. name: The Miller and Chimney Sweep

Well into the havoc&comma spectators gather and give chase to the flour-covered sweep and the "well-sooted" miller.

name: Casey at the Bat
description: The umpire makes a decision that Casey doesn't like&comma and an argument follows&comma during which Casey deftly trips him up&comma and continues the argument on the ground.
